title: trade a t202 cobb for cobb?

posts.post_title: trade a t202 cobb for cobb?
posts.post_content:
Im looking for the Good play at third cobb/moriarity card. I have an SGC 10 fast work at third to trade and can throw in a little cash as well. My scanner is broke so if you want a better picture let me know and Ill see what i can do. Also have a nice speaker/engle PSA4 MK
